title: criptoevangelista
author: criptoevangelista
created_time: November 29, 2023, 05:17:02 PMLast edit: February 22, 2025, 11:24:42 AM by criptoevangelista
content: Hello, I am a professional CAM programmer and I am offering my services, programming molds and complex parts, horizontal CNC 3 and 4 axis and turning... I use SolidCAM and EdgeCAM software. I accept Bitcoins and I can also work from home at a time to be agreed, I am located in Brazil.rules:I execute the programming of your part, or provide advice on machining strategies to optimize time in the industry.I can also program turning and turning with driven tools.All programs are customized according to the customer's needs, tailored to their tools and cutting parameters.contact:Please send a PMpayments:As everything involving machining in the industry is done in a personalized way, each and every service must be negotiated individually, everything varies according to the complexity and dedication required to achieve the objective, get in touch, we can certainly reach a fair price for you. I accept only BITCOINAs an example of my work, I made my own bitcoin out of aluminum, you can see photos through this link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474660.0Here are some photos of my work

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: This is certainly very interesting service . It looks like you are good at what you do. I think you must have good knowledge about the G & M codes related to CNC programming.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: You got a good skills mate and I must commend you for putting it up here for services. But you have to spell out your terms and conditions including your payment terms which you know is very necessary information your prospective clients would need to look into before approaching you for your services. If you can edit this thread and make it more professional coupled with the fact that it is your announcement thread for your services rendered I believe members would find it more attractive and interesting to engage with.

I think you must have good knowledge about the G & M codes related to CNC programming.Thanks to the message, it's a very interesting profession, it's really cool to see metal transformation.I made my own physical bitcoin, if you want to look, this is the link, it was very goodhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474660.0

If you have any other suggestions, I would appreciate it.Quote from: criptoevangelista on November 30, 2023, 11:43:33 AMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5474660.0I see you really listened to advise, conversations and contributions. I think this would help you alot in developing your business and building a better business relationship with your clients globally as your capacity can sustain. I had to go through the link provided by you and I must say that your designs are unique. You are an expert at your field and you got some good designs to start with.I will suggest you also put some of the the design here for easy view because that is the output of what you have uploaded here for viewing. When people see the machine and they see the output, there would be some level of confidence they would have in your capacity and capability to deliver if you are being contacted for job.

comments.author: criptoevangelista
comments.body: Hello! I still have the services available!We can combine something interesting for everyone to win I can make 3D designs, printable coins with your logo like I did this one for MoparMining
